document.full_text: former new york giants wide receiver plaxico burress was released from prison on monday after serving 20 months on gun charges and the 2008 super bowl hero hopes to return to play in the national football league (nfl).
document.title: former giants receiver burress released from prison
lines_and_colors: former new york giants wide receiver plaxico burress was released from prison on monday after serving 20 months on gun charges and the 2008 super bowl hero hopes to return to play in the national football league (nfl).
